itinerary.mapNote: Dana Biosphere Reserve descent. Copper mine ruins. 400m.
Wadi Feynan traverse. Bedouin desert landscapes. 900m.
Rose-red carved canyon. Quieter sister to Petra. 1000m.
Ad Deir Monastery approach. Nabataean carved city. 900m.

waypoints.name: Treasury (Al-Khazneh)
waypoints.note: Petra's most iconic facade. Indiana Jones & the Last Crusade.

waypoints.name: Ad Deir Monastery
waypoints.note: Larger than the Treasury. 800 steps. Worth the climb.

waypoints.name: Wadi Rum (nearby)
waypoints.note: Desert of the Moon. T.E. Lawrence country. Mars analogue site.

waypoints.name: Dana Biosphere Reserve
waypoints.note: Jordan's largest nature reserve. Trek starting area.

waypoints.name: Little Petra (Siq al-Barid)
waypoints.note: Nabataean carved canyon. Painted dining room ceiling. Day before Petra.
